summary: Texture & mesh replacer for female ebony armor which is a bit more revealing
descriptionHtml:
AURABEAT\'S Revealing Ebony Cleric Armor

Based on the amazing work of Shadra, daejones, and Zonzai. without which none of this would have been possible. They did most of the work, I just added my idea too it.

daejones, Who has made the orriginal Cleric Armour on which this upgrate is inspired.
To see the orriginal Cleric Armour, go here:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2384

Zonzai,The 14 HQ Noctural robes. outstanding work, that deserves plenty of credit.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1040

CBBE version of this Mod. enjoy ^^
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2738

-Craftable Cleric-
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3214

-Nocturnal Textures-
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2528

Shadra, who did some excellent recoloring
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2554

DESCRIPTION

This mod is a texture replacer for female ebony armor which is a bit more revealing. I hope you enjoy it and let me know what you think.   

INSTALLING

Once you have downloaded and extracted the mod, simply place the folder named \"textures\" and \"meshes\" into your Skyrim \"Data\" folder. For most of you, this will be: 

C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

UNINSTALLING

To uninstall, simply enter the \"Data\" folder in your Skyrim directory, then enter \"textures\\armor\" and delete the folders named \"ebonyarmor\" and \"CEMarmour\" Then enter \"meshes\\armor\" then delete the folder named \"ebony\".

PLEASE NOTE

This mod replaces the texture of the female ebony armor, so as long as this mod is installed you will not see the original version in game.
author: Aurabeat
